Clues are in alphabetical, in a sense.
Try pairing answers that seem similar in nature.
Answers can be paired as items from one of 13 ABC books. Authors are given at the bottom.
There is one answer for each letter of the alphabet, with answers in alphabetical order (although it might not seem like it)
After working out how the 26 answers (one each for A-Z) pair, use them to decode the string of letters.
